reviews.review: Its cheap and comes with lots of fun unlike your mom

[h1]Rating: Recommended[/h1]

Simple, but great fun. Fans of wave-based challenges and FPS should look no further than Killing Floor. Continued developer support through seasonal events doesn't hurt, either.

I rate this game:
[strike]Essential[/strike]
[b]Recommended[/b]
[strike]Conditionally recommended[/strike]
[strike]Not recommended[/strike]
[strike]Avoid[/strike]
One of my favorites, a lot of achivements, challenging and fun to play with friends, and also its cheap. I recommend it.
Good game, kill zombies, blow shit up. Dat's about it, what else ya need? Cupcakes?

Killing Floor is a fun, fast-paced survival horror shooter. 6 upgradable perks, several maps with more added every now and then, custom content, tons of guns, built in slow-mo, there's nothing completly wrong with this picture.
Provides several hours of fun by yourself, with strangers, or with friends.
On the downside, gameplay can often become quite repititive, but it's always fun to jump in with friends
A good way to kill some time. Challenging, addictive and the sound of exploding zombie heads is pretty rewarding.

ooi!

wave based fps where a team of players take on waves of zeds/zombie-ish things.
killing floor er et mega fedt spil køb det

A well designed survival (emphasis on the defensive) game, with varied, thematically interesting enemies that fulfill particular roles, classes that encourage the development of differing playstyles, and a rather deranged sense of humor, as exhibited by the events. Good replay value, with many maps. This game has my endorsement.

If your looking for a real coop game, this is probably one of the best ones hands down.

Killing Zombies and using your own skills with up to 6 others can make this game extreamly fun!
Surprisingly fun considering how simple the concept is, and the voice acting is so incredibly bad that it wraps around and becomes AWESOME. This game is easily worth loawds of monnaye.
melhor que Left 4 Dead
This is a reallyyyyy fun game, with the blood spattering from the brains of zombies. Ah, how lovely
Excellent Zombie shooter. Great gameplay and strong use of perk system. Has good and steady updates and is always fun to play, even after getting everything to Level 6. Would absolutely recommend.
great game but better if you have friends that also have it
Some of the best money spent on Steam.  For the amount I've played this, it's probably the best dollar to entertainment value I've ever had.

It's an FPS for you twitchy types with a leveling system fit for the MMO crowd. Survive waves of enemies with a variety of weapons for any playstyle: crossbows for the perfectionists, grenade launchers for griefers, and katanas for keeping everybody in slow motion. My personal favorite weapon is the M14. It's challenging for the soloist, plus mad shenanigans in multiplayer. A pretty solid game, if a bit repetitive since there's only one game mode. Best played if you can get a group of friends together.

Postscript: The Summer Sideshow 2013 Update saw the implementation of an Objectives Mode, directing players to clear a variety of tasks which still culminate in a Patriarch fight. These objectives range from your standard "Kill X Zeds" to "Run the miracle kilometer in your underwear while juggling a bunch of gold." It can get pretty hectic. Nevertheless, it is a welcome addition to the core game since it offers loads more flexibility to how maps can be made and played.
De los juegos que me han salido más rentables. Barato y porrón de horas por delante

Ever heard of Left 4 Dead? Of course you have, but lets be honest, it would a lot better if everyone had british accents and didn't all have the same abilities, that's the basic premise of Killing Floor. You're in a team of up to 6 and can select from 7 different perks, each with their own special way to kill zombies, the zombies have 8 different ways to kill you as well. You'll fight zombies in ever-growing waves, with breaks in-between to buy new guns with the dosh you've accumulated, the action comes to a climax when the head zombie appears to deal with you himself. Killing Floor is a lot of fun, arguably more so than Left 4 Dead, there's no annoying "I'm knocked on the ground and now you have to come spend 5 seconds picking me up" situations, if someone runs out of health, they're just dead, no defibrilators, end of story, they'll respawn when the next shopping break occurs, but they lose most of the weapons they had and have to re-buy them, so be sure to be charitable.
I think Killing Floor is a pretty cool guy. eh kills zombeis and doesnt afraid of anything.

A great co-op survival shooter with horror theme. Needs some skill and teamwork feeling. Perfect game for time killing. The co-op mode makes it dynamic so you will never live through the same game. The perk system makes you wish to play it again and again till you get all of them at max. And then you will play just to enjoy the game with other players
Nagyon jó zombis játék, csak ajánlani tudom! ^^
I would bend over for this game.
バーベキュートゥナイト
A good, fun game to play with friends, well worth the price
Awesome game! Must have for any zombie shoot-em-up fan!!!!

Killing Floor English:

Killing Floor is a co-op game that has great graphics and gameplay rather than innovative. In the game, there is a system of "Level Up" where you can upload several classes, each with its specified weapon.

Killing Floor Portuguese:

Killing Floor é um jogo co-op que possui ótimos gráficos e uma jogabilidade um tanto que inovadora. No jogo, existe o sistema de "Level Up" onde você pode upar diversas classes, cada uma com sua arma específicada.

If you think camping in a corner while smacking zombies with your elbows in the midst of reloading your weapon is awesome, then you're wrong. Educate yourself on the ways of a true shambling zombie apocolypse by getting this game and seeing what it's like having to actually remain on the run from hordes of murderous monsters that aren't weaker than paper.

Rpg-ish fast-paced horde killing zombie fps game... what's not to love? 

And comes pretty cheap too, with loads of updates (maps and character dlc) and blood! 

****/5
Fun, if repeatitive. Graphics are dated, but that just means anyone can play at max settings. If you wanted top level to be something that takes a lot of effort to reach this'll keep you busy.

Need more skills than L4D !
Need a versus mode too :(
INSANE IN THE MEMBRANE

Klasszikus céllövölde a mostanában nagyon divatos zombis témára építve.

Aki bírja az ilyen "eszetlen" játékokat annak melegen tudom ajánlani; bár magasabb fokozaton nagyon fontos a map kellő ismerete, illetve kell egy jól működő csapat.

Amint a fenti kettő teljesül egy igazán izgalmas túlélő horrorként lehet definiálni a Killing Floort. :D
Good survival coop game
highly recommended to anyone who loves killing zombies

It's a fun way to kill time. If you're in it for achievements, however, you'll be there for a while. Most achievements are tied to seasonal events or beating the levels on different degrees of difficulty, and most levels above normal require your perks to be around 4 at the lowest to be effective. And perks take some time to level up, since they cap at 6. It's still more fun than Left4Dead, though-- just somewhat of a time-sink to progress :)
Family-friendly survival simulation game. Has tasteful music and teaches the value of friendship and teamwork. Fun for all ages!

Zombie shooting at its purest, not the prettiest and kinda rough around the edges but a solid game best served with up to 5 friends.

Class-based shooter except for once you're all on the same team, think Left4Dead but more free roaming and with character progression, team balance and strategy actually come into it, and it's a proper challenge.
Killing Floor ist der ultimative Mampf!
Not as polished as the L4D franchise, but definitely more compulsive.

The weapons in this game are awesome, they have the best feel to them of any FPS weapons I've seen, The action is intence, the mutli player is an adrenaline rush and who doesn't love killing zombies... I know they're not really zombies but come on, they pretty much are. If you're playing Left4Dead instead playing this game... stop that now
kill'em or get killed ;D

Strange Zombie-like creatures aplenty, a mess of exploding heads and body parts, and now with Aperture Science housing a golden potato. It's pure ammusement and doesn't cost 'Loads of money'. This shooter specifies teamwork as opposed to pure PvP, making it a unique gem among the genre.

Including a "Class" based system that levels up as you play, really addictive and really worth a play.
The most fun you can have online! :D

must have!

Made with the Unreal Engine this awesome team based zombie destroying fragtacular game is awesome for wasting time, or when you just want to kill hundreds of freaky undead weirdos. Imagine Left4Dead meets Unreal meets Fun. The game is regularly updated and best enjoyed with a friend. So check it out and kill some zombies.
Очень интересная и динамическая игра, может одиночный режим вам будет и не очень по вкусу, но мультиплеер оставит вам самые яркие впечатления, моя оценка 10 из 10!

I will warn you, this game is pretty addictive ! If you like slaying strange monsters with slow motion headshots, this game is for you ! There are multiple events every seasons and the game has now a workshop to create and give ideas to the game's dev team. They are adding new stuff frequently. If you think that the highest difficulties are too difficult; don't worry, there's a level system that will make you addicted to this game and that will help you by having guns and powerups earlier in your rounds.

I recommend this game to players that love to kill monsters by aiming the head ! This game was made to play with other people/friends, so don't be shy and play online !
Juegazo para ser el matazombis de la semana. 10!!!
Ce jeu est une vraie bombe, vas-y bb !
thisi s good gam
The best in survival horror game... fun to play, upgrades, ALLOT of maps... just fraking awesome

Great game if you like co-op play... but it uses the Unreal Tournament 2004 engine and sadly keeps the bugs it had such as missing stuff with packet loss.
Still a fun game though and worth every penny.
FPS de alta qualidade. Gráficos excelentes, sendo um dos melhores multiplayers do gênero.

Great action packed zombie FPS with the intensity ramping up each wave you progress to. If you need a game to let off steam or waste a half hour and not worry about a storyline, it will definately fill that role. 

This game is totally spookin' my guts off!

People often compare this game to Left 4 Dead because it's a zombie game. Please don't. What this game really is is a much more enhanced and realized version of CoD: Bl Ops zombie mode. This game is quite something, set up to kill you as fast as possible. What the game wants is you dead. What you want is to survive, and to kill the end-boss. A few things that Black Ops doesn't offer you, but Killing Floor does...

An end to the oncoming horde
A way to win
useful Grenade Launchers
an End-boss
enough different types of zombies to ensure you can't run off alone ever
6 player co-operative play
door welding to make those bloody freaks go a different route...Or force their way through.
ZED time - a mode much like FEAR's enhanced reflex mode, time slows down for a short period and allows you a bit better headshots or kills or what-have-you. 

All in all, it's a steal for $20. It's even more of a steal with Steam's summer sale event.
Tout simplement énorme ! Du bon co-op survival horror, juste.. awesome.
Great game, needs moar hats.

This game blows fucking dicks. The game itself is fine, but the boss is just a game of luck in that if he chooses to melee you, you just fucking explode. So if the boss does his melee attack on all six of you(He runs faster) Your entire team wipes and can't do anything about it, no stuns, no backup plans. Oh and you get to fight this thing after an hour of playtime only to be cheaply juggled to death by it's imba claw. Super fun. All other fun in this game is completely countered by the single boss being horrendous. It's not tactical, or strategic, you just fucking explode. It wouldn't feel as cheap if the claw did half damage, and the boss took twice as long to kill, but as it stands every attack he has just gibs a character, so even if you magically(Read:Easymode) the boss to death, it's an unsatisfying, tasteless victory, full of the spite and anger you've surpressed the last hour you've wasted.
A addicting co-op horror shooting game :)
